price: Cyangwa se (abahakanyi) baba bafite ibigirwamana (bizabafasha ku munsi w’imperuka)? Ngaho nibazane ibyo bigirwamana byabo niba ari abanyakuri.
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شُرَكَآءُ فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمۡ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: am lahum shurakāu falyatū bishurakāihim in kānū ṣādiqīna
